 Introduction

 Alex Mazurov

Gapps REST API
 
  Some demo simple REST API by Java Servlets
 
* Goals Overview
 
  General information about the goals.
 
  * https://remotejob.github.io/gapps_task short description for this plugin goal.
 
* Usage
 
  General instructions on how to use the Gapps REST API can be found on the https://github.com/remotejob/gapps_task/. Some more
  specific use cases are described in the examples given below. Last but not least, users occasionally contribute
  additional examples, tips or errata to the
  https://github.com/remotejob/gapps_task/wiki project wiki page.
 
  In case you still have questions regarding the plugin's usage, please have a look at the https://github.com/remotejob/gapps_task/issues and feel
  free to contact the support dot mazurov.eu. The posts to the mailing list are archived and could
  already contain the answer to your question as part of an older thread. Hence, it is also worth browsing/searching
  the https://github.com/remotejob/gapps_task/wiki mail archive}}.
 
  If you feel like the project is missing a feature or has a defect, you can fill a feature request or bug report in our
  https://github.com/remotejob/gapps_task/issues issue tracker}}. When creating a new issue, please provide a comprehensive description of your
  concern. Especially for fixing bugs it is crucial that the developers can reproduce your problem. For this reason,
  entire debug logs, POMs or most preferably little demo projects attached to the issue are very much appreciated.
  Of course, patches are welcome, too. 
 
* Examples
 
  To provide you with better understanding of some usages of the Gapps REST API,
  you can take a look into the following examples:
 
  * http://elite-name-224.appspot.com/
